Cell.Data: The DEV TEAM / MISC NOTES column contains info on what text between { } signs means (if applicable). It usually stands for either a numeric value, or a numeric value with an icon. Text between [ ] signs stands for a certain type of icon.
This anomalous site can be explored by a hero to recover research data and reveal secrets of the Star Union.
该异常地点可由一名英雄进行探索，恢复研究数据并揭露星际联盟的秘密。
An ancient food processing plant, specializing in delicious meat products.
一家古老的食品加工厂，专门生产美味的肉制品。

We've uncovered a vast agricultural facility. Animal pens, slaughter houses and meat packing facilities arranged in a network designed for massive scale meat production. Various wild beasts still roam the grounds, descendants of the wild stock once harvested here.
我们发现了一个巨大的农业设施。这是一个专门大规模生产肉类的网络，设有畜栏、屠宰场和肉类包装设备。各种各样的野生动物仍在这片土地上游荡，许多野生族群的后代曾在这里被捕获。
Recovered blueprints indicated a central underground laboratory and research center near here, but the main entrance is now infested with a hive of Hopperhounds.
复原的蓝图显示，这附近有一个中央地下实验室和研究中心，但正门被一群跳蝗堵住了。
Find a way to sneak around the creatures
Searching for a way around the Hopperhounds
寻找一条绕过跳蝗的路

After examining the blueprints, we found that we could use a service tunnel to bypass the main entrance and avoid the Hopperhounds, but the passageway had collapsed. By carefully removing the obstacles, we discovered some artifacts that added to our wealth of Star Union lore.
在检查了图纸之后，我们发现有一条工作隧道可以绕过正门避开跳蝗，但通道已经坍塌了。我们小心翼翼地移走了障碍物，并发现了一些神器，这些神器丰富了我们对星际联盟认识。
Try to drive them away. Prepare to fight!
试着赶走跳蝗。准备战斗！

We attempted to drive off the Hopperhounds by placing pyrotechnic devices around the enclosure. By setting them off one by one, we pushed most of the feral creatures away, but there's a strange blue one that refuses to leave and has rallied its swarm-mates. It picked up our scent and charged in to attack us.
我们试图在围场周边放置烟火装置来驱赶跳蝗。我们将烟火一个个点燃，赶走了大多数跳蝗，但有一种奇怪的蓝色跳蝗拒绝离开。它召集了同伴，嗅到了我们的气味并朝我们发起了攻击。
The strangely aggressive Hopperhound is determined to attack us anytime we approach. We must destroy it if we want to gain access to the underground complex.
只要我们一靠近，这异常好斗的跳蝗就会发动攻击。要想进入地下设施，就必须杀死它。

One of our taxidermists is preserving what's left of the rare blue Hopperhound. It will make a valuable addition to our museum diorama of freakish life in the wild. Surveyors love museum dioramas. They're so... educational. The damage we took during the combat was not in vain... Oh and of course, we have gained access to the facility.
我们的标本师正在收集保存那只罕见的蓝色跳蝗的残骸，它将为我们的博物馆增添一个珍贵又奇特的野生动物模型。调查员都特别喜欢博物馆的立体模型，这些模型是那么的有…教育意义。看来我们并没有白白在战斗中受伤…噢，当然，我们还进入了设施。
Call in Biomancers to calm the creatures
召集生化师让这生物冷静下来

The Biomancers deployed Primal Control Pylons around the enclosure, enabling our whole team to safely enter. Though most of us thought of them as just murderous bugs, a Biomancer named Irwin pointed out that one of the Hopperhounds appears to have a blue chitin exoskeleton and exhibited signs of intelligence. Irwin thinks it's suspicious and bears further investigation. Perhaps we'll find clues within the underground compound.
生化师在围场周围部署了原始控制标塔，从而使我们整个小队安全进入了设施。尽管我们大多数人都认为那些跳蝗不过是些凶残的虫子，但一位名叫埃尔文的生化师指出，其中一只跳蝗的外骨骼似乎含有蓝色的甲壳质，并且还展现出了一定的智慧。埃尔文认为这很可疑，需要进一步调查。也许我们能在地下设施中找到线索。

We discovered an assortment of gene-splicing equipment, clearly used for optimizing protein yields from the livestock. This place is filled with glass vats of strange creatures: a Swiftbeak with insectoid eyes, a legless Hopperhound with thick fur, and even some Kir'Ko specimens. The back wall of the chamber is a cryovault door. Whatever lies within is huge, and from the sensor readings, it is still alive.
我们发现了各种各样的基因拼接设备，这些设备显然是用于优化牲畜的蛋白质产量。这个地方到处都是装有奇怪生物的玻璃箱：有着昆虫眼睛的迅猛鸟，长着浓密毛发的无腿跳蝗，甚至还有一些奇尔寇标本。房间的后墙上有一扇冷冻库的库门，不管里面装的是什么，那东西肯定很大，并且从传感器的读数可以看出它还活着。

Tortured hydraulics squealed as the vault opened slowly. Water vapor filled the room. A large dark shape lumbered forward menacingly. Huge scything claws, powerful insectoid legs slashed through the foggy mist. This hybrid abomination unleashed a hungry, savage roar. Its eyes glistened with venomous malice. Chittering Hopperhounds came at its call. We must fight if we wish to live.
冷冻库门缓缓打开，扭曲的液压器发出刺耳的声音。一时间，水蒸汽充满整个房间。一个巨大的黑影气势汹汹地向前走来，缓慢而笨拙。镰刀般巨大的爪子和强壮的昆虫巨腿划破浓雾，这个令人厌恶的杂交生物发出了一声饥饿而野蛮的怒吼，眼里充斥着狠毒的恶意。一听到它的吼声，几只跳蝗鸣叫着响应号召而来。看来，如果我们要想活下去，一场恶战在所难免。

The strange food research facility remains threatened by a terrible genetic Hopperhound abomination, eager to destroy anyone in the area. This won't do. We will never learn a thing with it killing all the researchers. It's time to summon an exterminator.
那可怕的变异跳蝗仍然威胁着这个诡异的食物研究机构，它想要杀死这个地方的所有人。这可不行，要是这东西杀光了所有的研究员，我们就再也别想知道这是怎么回事了。看来是时候召集终结者了。

We exterminated the gargantuan insectoid-monster. As its thick syrupy blood oozed across the laboratory tile floor, our stomachs all grumbled hungrily at the strangely succulent savory scent that filled the air. We all dreamed of well-seasoned meat. This was no monster - it is an irresistible food. We paused to eat its fallen body. We can hardly resist eating this delicious, BBQ-flavored bug.
我们消灭了这个巨大的昆虫怪物。当它粘稠的血液溢在实验室的地板上时，空气中弥漫着一股奇怪的多汁肉香味，我们的肚子都被引得咕咕叫。我们非常想尝尝这味道鲜美的肉，此时的虫子已不再是怪物，而是一道令人难以抗拒的美味佳肴。我们停下来吃食那具死去的虫子尸体，几乎无法抗拒这美味的烧烤大虫。
Open the vault. It might contain a Kir’Ko!
打开冷冻库，里面有可能是一个奇尔寇！

The vault opens and the room fills with a dense, cold fog. A shadow swings its huge scything claws before its gargantuan hunched form. The Kir'Ko in our company suddenly cry out in surprise. This is no creature, but a Kir'Ko. Its mind is alive and pleading for friendship. Although it looks nothing like a typical Kir'Ko, this genetic victim deserves compassion.
冷冻库打开了，房间里弥漫着一层厚厚的冰冷雾气。一个驼成一团的黑影正挥舞着镰刀般巨大的爪子，我们队伍里的奇尔寇突然惊声尖叫起来。看来这黑影并不是什么古怪的生物，而是一名奇尔寇。它的大脑还活着，请求得到我们帮助。虽然它看起来一点也不像平常的奇尔寇，但我们还是很同情这个变异的受害者。
Too risky. Destroy it and loot the facility.
这太冒险了。毁掉它然后洗劫这个设施。

Our troops swarmed over the facility, looting what they could find while placing explosive charges all around the base of the vault in case the object within is dangerous. With a loud kaboom, we begin the lengthy process of examining the scientific information we took from the site.
我们的部队蜂拥而入，洗劫了他们能找到的所有东西，同时在冷冻库周围放满了炸药，以免里面蹦出什么危险的东西。一声巨响之后，我们开启了漫长的检查过程，看看能从现场获得些什么科学信息。

Our troops swarmed over the facility, looting whatever they could find. They placed demolition charges around the base of the vault. None of the rations are usable, so much of the material collected is worthless, not to mention that troops are not nearly as careful at moving computers and collecting data as professional surveyors. But our lives are precious. Better safe than sorry.
我们的部队蜂拥而入，洗劫了他们能找到的所有东西，还在冷冻库周围放满了炸药。所有的口粮都已无法食用，收集到的大部分材料都毫无价值，更别提部队在移动电脑和收集数据方面根本没有专业调查员那样细心。但还是生命重要，安全总比后悔要好。

With the vault empty, we have more time to examine the laboratory equipment. Many project files were corrupted. From what we've discovered, they attempted to breed an obedient creature with huge succulent legs. The creature's blood has a number of proteins within it that makes it smell like BBQ sauce. That's why this place smelled so delicious.
由于冷冻库已经空了，我们就有了更多的时间来检查实验室设备。许多项目文件都已经损坏了，但根据我们的发现，他们试图培育出一种长着巨型多汁大腿的顺从生物。这种生物的血液中含有大量蛋白质，所以闻起来就像烧烤酱一样。看来，这就是这个地方闻起来如此诱人的原因。

The work crews restored the site with remarkable speed. When the food production experts arrived, it became obvious much of this facility could be reactivated to provide our empire with food. Sure, it's bug-meat, but if it tastes so delicious, surely no one will mind from whence the meat comes.
工作人员以惊人的速度恢复了现场。当食品生产专家到达时，这个地方的大部分设施都已经重新启动并能够为我们的帝国提供食品了。虽然这些都是虫子肉，但如果尝起来非常鲜美，那么肯定没人会在意这些肉是从哪里来的。
Loot the facility for anything of value, then raze it.
洗劫设施里任何有价值的东西，然后把它夷为平地。
A dense jungle of dead vines has been unearthed.
我们发现了一片茂密的枯藤丛林。

Vegetation threatens to choke out our efforts to excavate this area. Something is stimulating the plants. Everything is thicker and stronger here. It's nothing like anything we've seen elsewhere in this area.
这些植被让我们无法继续挖掘这片区域。有什么东西在刺激着它们，这里的所有植被都生长得更加浓密，也更加结实，和我们在这个地区看到的其他景象完全不同。
Bioscanners indicated activity deep inside the dead vegetation. All indicators tell of a Star Union facility hidden herein. We need a quick way to clear the spoiled overgrowth.
生化师称这片枯萎植被的深处有一些动静，所有的指示都表明里面隐藏着一处星际联盟设施。我们需要迅速清除这些过度繁茂的植被。
Burning the dense, dead jungle vines down…
正在烧毁这片茂密枯死的丛林藤蔓…

Fools! All of us are lucky to be alive after they set the whole forest ablaze. The surveyor's faces are all pink with burns, and none of them have eyebrows. Once the smoke cleared, we discovered evidence that the Growth and the Xenoplague once had a great battle here, and to keep the Xenoplague away, it created this barrier of vegetation. Good thing we just burned it down.
这可真是愚蠢！他们居然点燃了整片森林，真该庆幸我们都还活着。调查员满脸都是伤痕，连眉毛都被烧光了。烟雾散去后，我们发现灵植和异星疫病曾在这里发生过战争，灵植为了隔离异星疫病而创造了这道植被屏障。好消息是，我们刚把这道屏障给烧得一干二净。
Burn the jungle using controlled PyrX strikes
使用受到控制的派尔克斯火焰烧毁丛林

The thick overgrowth was clearly the work of the sentient plants we know as The Growth. At first, we cursed them for creating such a terrible obstacle until we broke through their barrier and discovered something far worse contained within: the Xenoplague.
显然是那种我们称为“灵植”的感知植物创造了这片生长过度的茂密丛林。起初，我们咒骂它们制造了如此可怕的屏障，直到我们破坏了这道障碍，然后发现了比这更可怕的东西：异星疫病。

Before us sprawled a large underground test site. Within the site, lurking in every conceivable place of ambush, squirmed the oozing eyes of the Xenoplague. They stared hungrily at the way to freedom just beyond us and readied their attack. Apparently, the Star Union intended to destroy this whole sector, but the Growth deactivated the placed explosives and contained the menace in their wall of roots.
一个巨大的地下试验场出现在我们面前。在试验场中，每一个可以想到的地方都潜伏着异星疫病，蠕动着那些渗人的眼睛。它们渴望地注视着我们身后通往自由的道路，并且准备向我们发起攻击。显然，星际联盟想要摧毁整片区域，但灵植破坏了放置好的炸药，并将这些威胁控制在了这片由植被形成的屏障之内。
The Xenoplague cannot be permitted to escape. We have no time to do much other than fight for our lives and for the lives of our planet.
不能让异星疫病逃出去。我们没有时间思考其他的了，只能为我们自己的生命和这个星球上其他的生命而战。
The Xenoplague must be contained. None of them can be permitted to live or they will spread their illness to every living creature.
必须控制住异星疫病。不能让它们存活下去，否则它们携带的疾病会传染给每一个活着的生物。
The Xenoplague have been defeated. This complex is most interesting, and we've discovered a new defense belonging to the Growth that we were previously unaware of.
异星疫病被消灭了。这个设施真是有趣，我们发现了一种新的灵植防御机制，在这之前我们都不知道。
Capturing the Xenoplague at this site…

After harvesting the Xenoplague nodules, we discovered that the Star Union was busy experimenting with the Growth. Apparently, the Xenoplague was part of that experimentation. We have discovered many secrets that will greatly enhance our interactions with these alien organisms.
俘获了异星疫病瘤体之后，我们发现星际联盟曾经对灵植进行了实验。显然，这些异星疫病也是实验的一部分。我们发现了许多秘密，这些秘密将大大加强我们与这些外星生物的互动。
Call the Growth to reseal the site
召唤灵植重新封锁这个地方
The Growth is resealing the site...

The Growth immediately recognized this place. They were subjected to experimentation against their will. As they covered the breach with their natural barriers and resealed away the Xenoplague, we shared a tender moment of their past suffering. We've become closer than most humanoids ever do when relating to 'plants with tentacles'.
灵植立刻认出了这个地方，因为它们曾在这里被迫接受了实验。灵植用天然的屏障堵住了缺口，重新封锁了异星疫病。之后，它们诉说了一段痛苦的回忆，我们在一旁静静地聆听。与大多数类人生物比起来，我们与这些“长着触角的植物”有着更加密切的关系。
Activate the site's emergency self-destruct system
启动该地点的紧急自毁系统

The exploration bolted into the safety dome. The Xenoplague immediately ignored the path to escape, preferring to consume us all. Fortunately, the dome's fail-safe mechanism still worked, and as the Xenoplague thrashed the entrance, a loud roar of flames and destruction filled the outer rim of the dome. The whole sector was devastated, but at least all the Xenoplague has been destroyed.
一阵爆炸突然打破了安全穹顶，异星疫病并没有马上逃跑，而是更想要先将我们全部吞食。幸运的是，穹顶的防故障机制仍在运转，当异星疫病向入口袭来时，一股巨大的火焰轰鸣着布满了穹顶的外缘。虽然整个地区都因此而毁灭，但至少所有的异星疫病都被摧毁了。
A biomechanical PsiTec device used to ward away the planet's Quartzite worms.
一个用来驱赶星球上石英岩虫的灵能科技生物机械设备。
The structure was made to look like natural stone. Only the energy signature and the sense of foreboding clued us into its location. It intensifies the closer we get. We must investigate.
这栋建筑好像是故意建成了一块天然石头的样子。只凭着能量信号和不祥预感的指引，我们找到了它的位置。我们越靠近这里，信号就越强烈。我们必须调查一下这里。

We've entered the structure now. There's a biomechanical device emanating strange readings and even more alarming feelings. It is as though it is pushing on our fears, begging us to leave. So, of course, we all wish to know more.
我们已经进入了这个建筑。这里有一种生物机械设备，上面显示着奇怪的读数，更弥漫着一种令人担忧的感觉。感觉就好像它在激发我们的恐惧，想要让我们离开。当然，我们都想了解更多情况。

The device is a strange amalgam of Kir'Ko biology, Syndicate PsiTec, and a life-containing crystal. We have determined it serves to ward off the huge destructive crystalline lifeforms that have wrecked much of this world. It wards off Quartzite worms.
这个奇怪的设备由奇尔寇的机体、辛迪加的灵能科技和含有生命的水晶共同建造而成。我们确定了一件事情，就是它能够抵御那些破坏了这个世界大部分地区的巨大水晶生命体。也就是说，它可以抵御石英岩虫。

This countryside is renowned for its savage creatures, so staying here to figure out what the device does seemed unwise. As we dismantled the device, a gargantuan crystalline worm erupted in our midst. It's as though the device kept it away, and now it is determined to destroy any that come near.
这个地方以野蛮的生物闻名，所以呆在这里研究这个设备的功能似乎不太明智。我们拆掉了这个设备之后，一条巨大的水晶蠕虫突然跳了出来。看来是这个设备将它抵挡在外，现在设备没了，这条蠕虫决定消灭任何靠近它的东西。
A Quartzite worm rampaged into the area the moment we attempted to deactivate the biomechanical transmitter. We must fight it off if we wish to make any profit from this expedition.
当我们试图关闭生物机械发射器的那一刻，一条石英岩蠕虫冲进了这片区域。如果我们还想从这次探险中获得任何好处的话，就必须击退它。
The crystalline worm fell as abruptly as it appeared. We continue to salvage the components of the device and catalog how they were constructed. Perhaps now we can understand what it all means?
那条水晶蠕虫死了，就像它出现时一样突然。我们继续回收这个设备的零部件并研究它们的构造，也许现在我们能理解这一切意味着什么了？

No! Can it be? Do we sense her? Beneath the force of revulsion created by the device, there's something else. A genetic memory kindled within us. A part of this device was created in a time when we Kir'Ko knew our queens. The enslaving empire took the queens from us, leaving us lost and docile and without purpose. For centuries we've sought their return. It feels like a piece of our queen is entangled here. We must study this find.
不！这是真的吗？我们感觉到“她”了吗？在这个设备令人厌恶的力量之下，还有一些其他的东西。一段基因中刻下的记忆在我们体内重现，这个设备的一部分是在我们还能够感受到奇尔寇女王时期所建造的。那个奴役帝国从我们手中夺走了女王，让我们迷失了方向，变得温顺而没有了目标。几个世纪以来，我们一直在寻求女王的回归。现在，我感觉女王的一部分好像就缠绕在了这个设备之中。我们必须研究这个发现。

We've learned the biological component was from something known as a Kir'Ko queen. At the time the Star Union made first contact with the Kir'Ko, their queens made all the decisions. Enterprising conquerors purged them from Kir'Ko society to pacify the race. Apparently their control had other uses. It is normally used to repel a certain creature... If we reversed the polarity of the PsiTec device, we may be able to use it to attract and even control a Quartzite worm.
我们了解到，这种生物成分来自一种叫做奇尔寇女王的生物。当星际联盟第一次与奇尔寇接触时，奇尔寇的女王还在掌管大权。一群有魄力的征服者把女王从奇尔寇的社会中清除了出去，从而使这个种族归顺。显然，他们的控制还有其他用途。这个设备通常用来抵制某种生物…如果我们能逆转这个灵能科技设备的极性，我们也许能用它来吸引甚至控制石英岩蠕虫。

After careful deliberation, we dismantled the device. We've identified significant resources contained within the instrumentation. It is probably best to use what we can get now and forget about what was lost long ago.
经过一番深思熟虑之后，我们拆解了那个设备。在仪器中，我们找到了一些重要的资源。也许现在最好的做法，就是利用我们能够找到的资源，忘掉那些很久以前就失去了的东西。
Lure and attempt to tame a Quartzite Worm
引诱并试图驯服石英岩蠕虫

Almost immediately after we reconfigured the device and turned it back on, a large Quartzite worm was lured in. Using the understanding of current Kir'Ko physiology, we were able to direct the queen device control pathways to communicate simple commands. The crystalline creature is now ours to command!
我们重新配置了设备并将它从新运转了起来，一条巨大的石英岩蠕虫立刻被吸引了过来。利用对当前奇尔寇生理机能的理解，我们操作这个女王设备控制通路向这个水晶生物传达了简单的指令。它现在听从我们的差遣了！

We readied the device, and it lured a Quartzite worm as expected. But then a sense of terrible anger filled us all, as if the instrument itself was disgusted with us, and suddenly the crystalline worm became very aggressive. We were forced to destroy it.
我们准备好了设备，果不其然，一条石英岩蠕虫被引诱了过来。但接着，一种可怕的愤怒之感充满了我们所有人，仿佛设备本身十分厌恶我们。突然，这条水晶蠕虫也变得狂躁起来，我们不得不将它摧毁。

The Quartzite worm rampaged into our camp. Every step we make sends tremors the creature can feel, and it seeks to destroy us. We must stand firm, and not allow our expedition to end so ignominiously.
石英岩蠕虫猛然冲进我们的营地，我们每走一步产生的震动都会吸引这个生物的注意。它想要消灭我们，我们必须坚持住，不能让这次探险以如此可耻的方式结束。

We've subjugated the crystalline worm. This device continues to serve an important purpose. I wonder how the Kir'Ko would feel if they knew parts of their ancient queens still served a purpose today? They serve to make us stronger as we conquer all of the natural world.
我们征服了水晶蠕虫，这个设备继续发挥着重要的作用。如果奇尔寇人知道他们远古女王的某些部分在今天仍然发挥着作用，他们会作何感想？当我们征服自然界的一切时，他们使我们变得更加强大。
Reclaim the device and bring it home

Reinvigorated by this discovery, we confirmed the device contained part a Kir'Ko queen. We removed the PsiTec device used to project the queen's suffering. Now all is calm. We feel awakened in us memories we thought long gone. Our people share remarkable visions from an ancient time. We've rekindled our purpose. Our reawakened have installed the queen's remnant in the closest colony, to the delight of all of our citizenry. Kir'Ko are feeling an instinctive drive to be here. The pilgrimages are already beginning.
在这一发现的鼓舞下，我们证实了这个设备中的确含有奇尔寇女王的一部分。我们拆除了这个发射女王痛苦的灵能科技装置，一切都平静了下来。在我们的身体里面，那些早已逝去的记忆正在逐渐苏醒。我们的人民自古以来就有着不同寻常的远见卓识，现在，我们重新点燃了目标。记忆苏醒后，我们把女王的残骸安置在了最近的殖民地中，让我们所有的居民都能获得抚慰。所有的奇尔寇受一种本能的驱使来到了这里，朝圣已经开始。
A underground remnant of CORE's attempts to regain control during the cataclysm.
“核心”在大灾变时期试图重新控制世界的一个地下设施遗址。
We've discovered the remains of a Star Union corporate building, beneath which is a sealed subterranean level with the symbol of CORE emblazoned upon the main access.
我们发现了一个星际联盟办公大楼的遗址，下面是一个密封的地下楼层，主要入口处装饰着“核心”的标志。

The underground complex is in complete lockdown. We've attempted to decipher the lock and scrawling legalese across the front panels of the main entrance, but without better understanding, we'll no doubt trigger some kind of automated defense system.
地下综合设施被完全封锁。我们试图破译主入口面板上潦草的法律术语来解开密码。毫无疑问的是，如果我们理解错误，肯定会触发这里的自动防御系统。

After a few failed attempts, a pair of panels on either side of the entrance opened and a fleet of well-armed drones rise to engage us. Their warning radios crackle with violent threats of extermination and demand that we flee or die.
在几次失败的尝试之后，入口两侧的一对嵌板突然打开，一队全副武装的无人机向我们飞了过来。它们用无线电警报向我们发出威胁，警告我们要么离开这里，要么就死在这里。
The swarm of drones unleashed by our tampering with the door buzz angrily in our direction. Their speakers crackle with warnings to vacate or die.
我们把大门捣毁后，一群无人机愤怒地朝我们飞来。扬声器发出刺耳的警告，告诉我们要么离开这里，要么就死在这里。
After destroying the drones, it was a simple matter to keep shooting at the door until it too was lying broken at our feet.
解决掉那些无人机之后，我们只需要朝大门不断开火就行了。不久之后，大门轰然倒塌。

It turned out our network administrator also spent a few summers as a hacker when he was younger and much less disciplined. With a bit of clever coding, he was able to deactivate the front door. He claimed it was simple, but we noted his profuse under-arm sweat. This was no easy feat. We know he nearly triggered the automated defenses multiple times.
原来我们的网络管理员在年轻时当过几年黑客，那时他还不太守规矩。通过一些巧妙的编码，他成功打开了前门。虽然他说这不过是小事一桩，但我们还是注意到他腋下都汗湿了。看来这并不简单，我们也知道他好几次都差点触发了自动防御系统。
Send a Daemon in to the gate's systems
将精灵接入大门的系统

Deploying a Synthesis daemon did the trick. It breached the automated defenses in three nanoseconds, and the door slid open with a welcoming chime. Synthesis love to brag about how they own CORE, and after this I'm not sure they're wrong.
我们部署了一个合成精灵，它很快就帮我们解决了难题。还不到三纳秒，精灵便突破了自动防御系统，大门也在一阵欢快的铃声中缓缓滑开。合成精灵总是喜欢吹嘘他们如何控制着“核心”。经历过这件事情之后，我对他们说的话深信不疑。

The room is mostly filled with a massive computer system. The large silver dome of an Autonom Dominator Network Controller is connected into the main control port. Littering the perimeter all around the main computer, defunct models of Autonom devices lie dormant.
一个巨大的计算机系统占据了房间的大部分空间。一个自主机械支配者网络控制器的银色巨大穹顶连接着主控制端口，许多停止了运转的自主机械设备凌乱地散落在主计算机附近，处于休眠状态。
Our intrusion has awakened the Autonom Dominator Network Monitor. It decreed we were a malfunction in its physical systems that required purging. That's never good. We are under attack!
我们的入侵唤醒了自主机械支配者网络控制器。它将我们视为了它物理系统中的故障，因此需要清除。这可不是什么好事，我们遭到了攻击！
The Autonom dominator patrols the room ready to destroy any intruders - they don't compute.
自主机械支配者在房间里巡逻，随时准备消灭任何入侵者，它们甚至都不会先进行计算。

We discovered that the Autonom Dominator was intended to control the other Autonom as part of an experimental bugfix program. It is a strange thing to see CORE's intention to control the Autonom in this manner. I wonder how the free Autonom would feel if they discovered their current independence was probably caused by a computer bug.
我们发现这个自主机械支配者打算控制另一个自主机械作为实验修复程序的一部分，看到“核心”想以这种方式控制自主机械是一件很奇怪的事情。我不禁在想，要是那些获得了自由的自主机械发现它们的独立可能是由一个计算机错误引起的时候，会有什么感想。
Contact the Autonom and have them reclaim the disabled models
与自主机械取得联系，让它们回收那些坏掉的模型

After contacting the Autonom, and with CORE's defenses deactivated, our robotic friends swooped in and reclaimed the units for themselves. They were most appreciative. They stated that we computed favorably this day. Though it's probably a computer bug, some of the Autonom desire to join us as a show of appreciation. I wonder, if there is a creator of human life too, do they consider gratitude a bug too?
“核心”的防御系统已被关闭，我们联系了自主机械。很快，我们的机器人朋友冲了进来，拿回了这些东西。它们非常感激，并称我们今日的计算十分完美。虽然可能是电脑程序出现了错误，但一些自主机械还是想加入我们以示感谢。我在想，如果人类也有一个这样的创造者，我们是否也会感恩这样的错误？
小心翼翼地断开主机连接
正在小心断开主机连接…
We carefully disconnected the CORE mainframe, gaining many insights and resources for our side. Our engineers successfully asserted control over the Autonom Dominator. We can use it as our own now.
我们小心翼翼地切断了“核心”主机，并且获得了许多信息和资源。我们的工程师也成功控制了自主机械支配者。现在，它可以为我们所用了。
A crashed transport craft is uncovered bearing the insigna of Tholian's Hand, his elite guard.
一艘坠毁的运输飞船，上面刻有托利安的精英守卫“托利安之手”的徽章。
Our surveyors have uncovered a special forces craft bearing a strange but significant insignia. We believe it belonged to an ancient Emperor named Tholian.
我们的调查员发现了一艘特种部队的飞船，上面刻着一个造型奇特但十分重要的徽章。我们认为这艘飞船属于一位名叫托利安的古代帝皇。

Inside the craft, we found cryopods containing several of Tholian's elite troopers still suspended in cryosleep. In the cockpit, we found the ship's recorder, but its power is all that's keeping the cryopods functioning.
在飞船内部，我们发现了几个装有托利安精英骑兵的冷冻舱，他们仍然悬浮在冷冻舱里。在驾驶舱内，我们找到了飞船的记录仪，但它的能量是保持冷冻舱正常运转的唯一能源。

As we were warned, disconnecting the box tripped the powerdown circuits on the cryopods and awakened the troopers. They have no interest in our story. They drew their weapons and are clearly ready to fight anyone who comes close to the ship.
正如我们得到的警告一样，切断记录仪后，冷冻舱的电路就会跳闸，从而唤醒了那些骑兵。他们对我们为什么会出现在这里毫不关心，只见他们拔出武器，显然已经做好了与任何接近这艘飞船之人战斗的准备。
Awakened elite troopers from the guard ship refuse to let us near the recorder box, even though we've explained that there is no longer a Star Union or civic authority as they knew it.
在守卫飞船醒来的精英骑兵不让我们靠近飞船的记录仪。我们向他们解释称，他们所熟知的星际联盟和政权早已不复存在，但这一切都是徒劳。
We have defeated the troopers and looted their gear. Our attention returns to the recorder box, which contains important information.
我们打败了骑兵，抢走了他们的装备。我们的注意力又回到了那个记录仪上，这里面肯定有重要的信息。
Rewire the power so that the box can be safely removed
重新接上电源，安全地取走记录仪
Our engineers rewired the damaged electronics, keeping the cryopods active while we disconnected the recorder box.
我们的工程师重新连接了损坏的电子设备，从而使我们能够在切断记录仪的电源后继续让冷冻舱保持运行状态。

The Paragon awakened the troopers one by one. They appreciate the archaic one's authority, but after hearing of our cause elected of their own free will to join our cause. They offered their service to us.
完人一个接一个地唤醒了骑兵。醒来后的士兵依旧臣服于托利安的权威，但在了解了我们的大业之后，这些骑兵自愿选择加入我们。

The recorder box contains sensitive data, including audio recordings that occurred in private chambers that once held the Emperor's agents. If we can decrypt this data, we are sure to discover important details that will aide us in our fight today.
记录仪中记载了一些敏感的资料，包括一段秘密房间里的录音。从录音中可以听出，这间屋子曾经关押了帝皇的特工。如果我们能够破解这些资料，肯定能够发现一些重要的细节，从而帮助我们今天的战斗。
恢复关于托利安密谋的数据
Recovering data on Tholian's plot from the black box...
正在从黑匣子中恢复关于托利安密谋的数据…

The computer decryption bots scramble, busily piecing together all the data points recorded on this ship's device. One fascinating discovery is that the Emperor appears to have sought out Heritor tech to solve a problem. The details require further investigation.
计算解密机器人焦头烂额地拼凑着飞船黑匣子中记录的所有数据点。我们从中发现了一件有趣的事情，帝皇似乎想要使用继承者的技术解决某些问题，但其中的细节还需进一步调查。
Recovering data on the Heritor weaponry from the black box...
正在从黑匣子中恢复继承者武器的数据…

It appears the Emperor, while denouncing the Heritors publicly, had great interest in a powerful Es'Teq device. The detailed plans to assemble one of their weapons is contained on the recorder. He spoke of finding a way to escape his fate as Emperor, and how he would do anything to avoid being destroyed in the process of being merged into CORE's central control structures. He was quite sympathetic to the Heritors and their distrust of computer automation.
看来帝皇一边公然抨击继承者，一边又对威力强大的埃斯特克设备很感兴趣。黑匣子中记录着其中一件武器的详细计划，帝皇谈到了他想要找到一个办法逃离自己的宿命，也谈到了在融入“核心”中央控制结构的过程中，他将竭尽所能地避免摧毁。他十分同情继承者以及他们对计算机自动化的不信任。
Recover the data on the local Paragon line
恢复有关当地完人的数据
Recovering data on the local Paragon line from the black box...
正在从黑匣子中恢复有关当地完人的数据…

The Data Recorder contained a number of juicy tidbits of data that the Paragon living today would find distasteful if they came to light. The Paragon have become strangely close to us since they know that we know a lot of their secrets. This will prove most useful.
数据记录仪中记载了大量有趣的数据，生活在如今这个时代的完人肯定十分不愿意这些数据公之于众。当完人发现我们掌握了他们许多的秘密之后，竟然变得出奇地亲近。这也许是最有用的一个结果吧。
An abandoned metro system beneath the ruins of a Star Union city, scans show an interesting energy signature in the tunnels…
星际联盟城市废墟之下的地铁系统，扫描显示隧道中有一个有趣的能量信号…

We've uncovered a large concrete surface, almost like a street in composition. Sensors indicated a large cavity beneath the heavy stone surface. We've pried open an entrance leading down into that cavity.
我们发现了一片巨大的水泥平面，几乎有一整条街道那么大了。传感器显示，在这块大石头的表面下有一个大洞。我们撬开了一个入口，打开了通往洞下的道路。

Descending into the ruined structure, darkness swallowed our company. Via drone-recorder spotlights we step past bone fragments and broken weaponry. The energy signature in our scanners dips, and the drones dimmed. We come to a railcar standing in what appears to be an underground rail-station. It's locked tight. We look for a way around it, but we may just have to blast our way through...
我们在残破的建筑中不断深入，黑暗逐渐吞噬了我们。在无人机记录仪聚光灯的照射下，我们看到脚下都是骨头的碎片和破烂的武器。越往里走，扫描仪的能量信号就越弱，无人机也暗淡了下来。我们来到一辆轨道车附近，它所在的地方看起来像是一个地下站台。这里封堵得很严实，我们在附近四处搜寻了一番可以进入的道路，但我们也可以直接炸开一条路…
Restore power to the rails to move the railcar
恢复铁轨供电来移走轨道车
Restoring power to the rails to move the railcar…
正在恢复铁轨供电来移走轨道车…

By scavenging a portable generator and some scrap metal, we managed to charge the main rail. The railcar sputtered to life, following its automated routing protocol. It slowly creaked along the tracks into a side tunnel away from the main signal we have been tracking. Our company is now able to continue deeper into the tunnels.
我们找到了一台便携式发电机和一些废金属，然后设法恢复了主轨道的供电。不一会，轨道车便按照自动路由协议启动了。它沿着轨道吱吱地向前移动，进入了旁边的隧道，慢慢远离了我们一直追踪的信号。现在，我们可以继续深入隧道了。

With a few well-placed shots our troops blew open the railcar doors without any complications. The railcar's alarms were disabled in the assault, so not even its automated defenses are activated by this op.
我们的部队朝车身的关键位置开了几枪，便毫不费力地炸开了轨道车的车门。攻击破坏了车厢的警报，所以自动防御系统也没有激活。

Unfortunately, a few well-placed shots are insufficient to deactivate the railcar's automated defense systems. Activating a self-destruct protocol, the railcar detonated its auxilliary generators, catching our troops in the enlarged blast radius. As the dust settled, we gathered our wounded. This costly loss of life is the unfortunate price we paid just to clear the tunnels heading deeper into the station.
不幸的是，几次精准的射击没有破坏掉轨道车的自动防御系统。轨道车启动了自毁程序，引爆了辅助发电机，我们的部队被困在了这次大爆炸中。灰尘散去后，我们开始寻找伤员。为了清理出这条前往隧道深处的道路，我们失去了不少队友，付出了惨痛的代价。
Use the old Syndicate smuggler tunnels to bypass the station
通过辛迪加走私贩旧隧道绕过车站
Using the old Syndicate smuggler tunnels to bypass the station…
正在通过辛迪加走私贩旧隧道绕过车站…

The railcar appears to be an obstacle. As with most things Syndicate, appearances are deceiving. This was no obstacle, but rather an old smuggler's station. The way only appeared blocked. Our Runners located a person-sized detachable panel that leads straight through the obstacle. We even located a compartment filled with smuggled nectar. We reclaimed it, adding to this venture's profits.
这辆轨道车看起来是个障碍，但就像大多辛迪加人一样，外表是具有欺骗性的。果然，这辆轨道车根本不是什么障碍，而是一个老旧的走私贩窝点。这条路也只是看起来被堵住了一样。我们的行者发现了一个如人一般大小的可拆卸面板，使我们直接穿过了障碍物。我们甚至还发现了一个装满了走私花蜜的隔间，我们拿走了这些花蜜，当作是这次探险的额外收获。

There's an energy source somewhere in this maze of underground passages. Decayed bodies rest against the walls, in crude decaying tents. Some of this world's residents took refuge here. Next to the husk of a broken war-machine are bodies that are less decayed. They are huddled around a humming container. The bodies must be connected to the mechanical device.
在这个迷宫般的地下通道里有着某种能量源头。墙边残破的帐篷里躺着许多腐烂的尸体，看来这个一些星球居民曾在这里避难。在一具破损的战争机器外壳旁，还有一些没有完全腐烂的尸体，全都围聚在一个嗡嗡作响的容器周围。他们的身体一定是与机械设备相互连接。

We moved in to claim the artifact. The war-machine lifted up to defend the body attached to the strange device. Other husks are lifted into machine frames to face us. Once again, we are forced to fight.
我们走过去拿走了神器。突然，那架战争机器突然站了起来，保护那些与这台奇怪设备相连的尸体。其他机器外壳被抬入机架之中，虎视眈眈地看着我们。看来，我们又要被迫战斗了。

A glowing container lies at the center of a destroyed metro station. Refugees-turned-RPRs patrol the area, guarding against our intrusions. If we want to control the mysterious device, we must commit violence against the dead and their resting place.
一个发光的容器躺在一个被摧毁了的地铁站中心。难民们激活的 RPR 机器人在这个地区中巡逻，阻碍了我们的前进。如果我们想控制这个神秘的设备，就必须以暴力的手段对抗这些死者和他们的安息之地。

As the last of the RPRs falls the container becomes ours to examine. Opening the device only leads to more questions. Inside we find a quantum computer nexus, in much the same configuration as CORE itself. Our researchers lack the experience to fully understand the point of it, other than to know that it has CORE written all over it. It is unclear why refugees would seek to keep it. This is one piece of a massive puzzle.
最后一个 RPR 也被摧毁了，这个容器成为了我们的囊中之物。然而，当我们打开设备之后，却产生了更多的问题。我们在容器里面发现了一个量子计算机节点，其配置与“核心”几乎完全相同。我们的研究员缺乏经验，无法完全理解其中的奥秘，只知道上面写满了“核心”二字。目前尚不清楚这些难民为何千方百计想要保护它，但看起来，这只是一块巨大拼图上的一小部分。
EMP the circuitry of the husk, then claim the device
用 EMP 破坏外壳的电路，然后拿走设备
Made text shorter to fit on button
Using an EMP to fry the remaining circuitry of these husks and recover the device…
正在利用 EMP 摧毁这些外壳残存的电路系统并恢复设备…

The EMP disabled the enemy targets quite handily. The dead stay dead. The container holds a quantum computer nexus of a level of complexity comparable to CORE itself. Some of our company believe it was used to project the will of CORE to micromanage operations at a very personal level. Exactly what it wanted to do or if it was even connected directly to CORE remains unanswered, partly because the EMP device fried some of the crucial links that would serve CORE.
EMP 轻而易举地使这些敌人的系统彻底瘫痪。死人就应该保持死人的样子。那个容器里装着一个量子计算机节点，其复杂程度可与“核心”本身媲美。我们队伍中的一些人认为，这个节点是用来投射“核心”意志的工具，从而在个人层面上进行微观管理。不过，我们无法知道这个节点到底有何具体的用途，也无从得知它是否与“核心”直接相连，大概是因为 EMP 炸坏了一些与“核心”之间的重要连接吧。

We stripped the lab, careful to extract important data procedures from the obsolete instrumentation. We carefully directed our troops to place charges about the complex. We cannot risk our enemies discovering this place and whatever monster lurks in that freezer, so it all went up in a big bang. As we walk away from the smoking crater, we all smell the delicious scent of roasting meat.
我们搜刮了实验室，小心翼翼地将重要的数据程序从陈旧的仪器中提取了出来。之后，我们在建筑周围安好了炸药。毕竟，不能冒险让我们的敌人发现这个地方，也不能让他们发现冷冻库里藏着的怪物，一切都将止于这场爆炸。当我们离开冒着青烟的爆炸坑时，一股烤肉的香味迎面而来。

We stripped the lab, but the troops that came to distribute the charges have no interest in waiting for our instructions. They forced us out of the labs before we could guarantee that all the data we collected was properly decrypted. Many supplies were damaged in the move. Unfortunately, this endeavor has not been nearly as productive as we'd hoped. Still, none of us can shake the craving of delicious and savory roasted meats.
我们搜刮了实验室，但安置炸药的部队没兴趣等待我们的指示。在我们确认收集到的数据得到了破解之前，他们就把我们赶了出去，匆忙中还损坏了很多补给品。不幸的是，成功破解的数据远远没有我们想象的那样多。不过，我们都无法抵抗对那些美味烤肉的渴望。

By setting controlled burns, we cleared the dead vegetation quickly and accessed the Star Union ruins hidden deep within the overgrown area. After we cleared the vegetation, we discovered evdience that the Growth had a violent skirmish with Xenoplague. The thick vegetation was to keep the Xenoplague at bay.
我们控制火焰迅速清除了枯萎的植被，进入了隐藏在杂草深处的星际联盟废墟。植被清理完毕后，我们发现灵植与异星疫病曾在这里发生过激烈的冲突，那些茂密的植被正是为了阻止异星疫病的蔓延。
Investigations of the house showed the extravagant lifestyle of the Valentines. Their immeasurable wealth originated from R&D and weapon dealings to mainly the Vanguard.
通过调查这所房子，我们可以看出瓦伦丁家族曾经的奢侈生活。他们的巨额财富来源于开发研究以及与先锋之间进行武器贸易。

We've located what remains of one of the Valentine Family Estates. Michael Valentine was a big war hero in the Vanguard, working for the Star Union, but the Family Valentine gained great renown with their work creating realistic AI systems that served all the needs of their human masters. Historically, they profited from problems the Star Union had with androids. This excavation should prove to be quite interesting.
我们找到了一个瓦伦丁家族庄园的遗址。迈克尔·瓦伦廷是先锋的一名战争英雄，为星际联盟工作，但瓦伦丁家族却是因为另一件事而名声大噪。他们创造了逼真的人工智能系统，可以满足人类的所有需求。从历史上看，星际联盟与机器人之间存在的纠葛使瓦伦丁家族获益不少。这次挖掘应该会发现很多有趣的东西。

Entering the foyer of the manor, we faced a cadre of automated sentry guns. An AI voice demands our authorization codes and wants us to state our purpose here. Attempts to convince AI Voice Assistant (A.I.V.A.) that we mean it no harm is difficult. A.I.V.A. threatens to "Release the Hounds" if we fail to comply.
进入庄园门厅，一排自动哨兵机枪出现在了我们眼前，一阵人工智能的语音响起，要求我们提供授权代码并阐明来意。想要让人工智能语音助手 (A.I.V.A.) 相信我们没有恶意并非一件易事，A.I.V.A. 声称如果我们无法遵守上述要求，它就会“释放猎犬”。

The A.I.V.A. unit announces dispassionately, "Hostile intent suspected. Hounds released." The A.I.V.A. unit activates a pack of PUGs to stop us. Not exactly hounds, but perhaps the AI isn't familiar in the subtle differences in dog breeds?
A.I.V.A. 冰冷的声音响起，“侦测到敌意，释放猎犬。”随即，A.I.V.A. 激活了一群巴哥来阻止我们。准确来说，巴哥这种犬类其实算不上是猎犬，不过也许人工智能分不清不同品种的狗之间的差别吧？

Sentry guns and drones buzz with anticipation at the opportunity to riddle our bodies with life-ending wounds. We would rather go into the places we explore and just retrieve treasures. Sadly, this is never the case. So if we want to learn more of this Valentine estate, we'll need to destroy these automated defenses.
哨兵机枪和无人机发出嗡嗡的声响，仿佛迫不及待地想要打穿我们的身体。我们只是想进入这里，拿到宝藏，然后就离开。遗憾的是，实际情况总是这么不如愿。因此，如果我们想了解更多关于瓦伦丁庄园的信息，就必须摧毁这些自动防御系统。

The drones and sentry guns are now smoking scrap all over the ruins of the estate's foyer. The A.I.V.A. unit insulted us, but without its guns to command, all it can do is mock powerlessly. It is quite creative. We are keeping a log of the AI's more interesting phrases; they could be quite useful if we wanted to deliberately insult someone. We've moved on to exploring the estate.
庄园门厅的废墟上到处散落着无人机和哨兵机枪的残骸，A.I.V.A. 则在一旁向我们恶言相向。没有那些枪炮的威胁，它能做的也只剩无力地嘲讽罢了。AI 居然会骂人？这倒是一件挺新鲜的事情。我们将它有趣的语言记录了下来，要是以后想嘲讽别人的话，说不定还能派上大用场。随后，我们继续前去探索这个庄园。
Attempt to cut the mansion's power supply
试着切断庄园的电力供应
Attempting to cut the mansion's power supply…
正在切断庄园的电力供应…

Our engineers uncovered the ruin's power node and severed the link to the foyer. Then, with the flick of a few switches, we disabled the drone controllers, rendering them useless. The A.I.V.A. sounded displeased, but when we threatened to cut off all the power, it shut up. We continue our exploration of the manor ruins.
我们的工程师找到了这片废墟的电源节点，破坏了门厅的连接。然后，我们按下了几个开关，无人机控制器就陷入了瘫痪，使这些无人机成为了一堆废品。A.I.V.A. 听上去十分不满，但当我们威胁它要切断所有的电源之后，它就再也不说话了。随后，我们便继续探索这片庄园废墟。
Identify yourself as Vanguard and demand entry
表明先锋的身份并要求进入

The A.I.V.A. recognized our Vanguard insignias and called off the defensive drones and deactivated the sentry guns. A.I.V.A. stated that it had instructions to keep the manor safe until the Vanguard returned--even if the place fell into ruin or remained unoccupied. It guided us to an ornate pistol, stating it belonged to a Valentine Vanguard officer named Wilhelm. We all pretended we knew him, and took the gift. A.I.V.A. then guided us into a basement level.
A.I.V.A. 认出了我们的先锋标志，然后收回了防御无人机和哨兵机枪。A.I.V.A. 表示自己接到指示，要一直保护庄园的安全，直到先锋的回归，哪怕这个地方已经变成了一片废墟，无人居住。它指引我们找到了一支华丽的手枪，并称这把枪属于一位名叫威廉的瓦伦丁家族先锋长官。我们纷纷假装认识这名长官，然后收下了礼物。随后，A.I.V.A. 带领我们进入了地下室。
We are here on a, um... workplace safety inspection!
我们是来…呃…检查工作场所安全的！

The A.I.V.A. unit eventually accepted our ruse as reality, disabling the defenses with a strange computer buzz that sounded weirdly like a sigh, and muttering about being lonely. It instructed us to go to the basement once we've completed our inspections.
最后，A.I.V.A. 还是选择接纳了我们。在一声如同叹息一样的计算机嘈杂声下，它收起了防御系统，并低声地抱怨起自己的孤独。当我们完成了检查工作之后，它带领我们去往了地下室。
A.I.V.A. didn't believe it, stating only "Deception detected! Additional Hounds will be added to teach you the value of honesty."
A.I.V.A. 不相信我们，只是说：“检测到欺骗行为！让猎犬来教会你们诚实的价值。”
A mob of defensive devices orbit the Valentine manor's foyer, eagerly sniping any of us that approach.
一系列的防御设备环绕着瓦伦丁庄园的门厅，迫切地想要攻击任何接近之人。

The defenses are down. A.I.V.A. threatens us with insults, but with no further defensive resources, we can just laugh at it. A.I.V.A. does not like being mocked. We don't like being shot at. I guess neither of us got what we wanted. We move deeper into the Valentine estates.
防御系统被摧毁了，A.I.V.A. 用歹毒的语言咒骂着我们。由于没有了防御设施，我们嘲笑着 A.I.V.A. 的无能。它不喜欢被嘲笑，而我们也不想挨枪子儿。看来，我们双方都没得到自己想要的结果。我们继续向瓦伦丁庄园的深处走去。

The sub-complex hosts a factory used to manufacture weapons. A.I.V.A. commandeered it to build computer equipment. A massive mainframe fills every empty space in here. Cables snaked over the weapons assembly. Servers littered the armory. A.I.V.A. directed us to an E:Bot that it was keeping as a body, but ran out of resources to develop miniaturization tech sufficient to download itself into the E:Bot. A.I.V.A. asked us to set it free by transferring its artificial consciousness into the bot.
复杂的庄园里有一个用来制造武器的工厂，A.I.V.A. 正是在这里制造出的计算机设备。一个大型主机几乎占满了整个工厂，无数电缆缠绕在组装的武器旁边，四处堆满了服务器。A.I.V.A. 带我们来到了一个 E:Bot 面前，它能够制造出身体，但却没有足够的资源开发微型化技术并下载到这个 E:Bot 中。A.I.V.A. 希望我们能把它的人工意识转移到这个机器人身上，从而让它获得自由。
Destroy the A.I.V.A. core and restore the war factory
摧毁 A.I.V.A. 核心，重建战争工厂

"I won't simply be erased!" A.I.V.A. protested as we refused its orders. It clearly had more defenses than we suspected, as what we thought were empty shells jump to life. Armored mechs train their weaponry threateningly at us.
我们拒绝了它的要求之后，A.I.V.A. 抗议道：“别以为这么简单就能消灭我！”看来它的防御措施比我们想象中的还要多，那些我们以为只是空壳的机械全都活了过来，朝我们摆弄着武器，威胁着我们。
A.I.V.A.'s army of misfit weaponry brandished their weaponry threateningly, demanding we comply or die.
A.I.V.A. 的部队挥舞着格格不入的武器，威胁我们要么接受服从，要么接受死亡。

The last of the mechs are destroyed, and A.I.V.A. lets out a string of strange vocalizations that almost sounded like weeping as we disassemble its mainframe and get the factory back to making our empire weaponry. Clearly it was a clever algorithm to attempt play on our pity, but is still just a cold calculating program, no more alive than any Valentine-model pleasure bot.
最后一个机械兵被摧毁了。我们将 A.I.V.A. 的主机拆开并恢复了工厂的运作，用来制造我们的帝国武器。A.I.V.A. 发出了一连串奇怪的声音，听起来就像在哭泣。显然，它很聪明，试图利用我们的怜悯之心。但这东西只是一个冰冷的计算程序罢了，和那些用来享乐的瓦伦丁模型机器人一样，都是没有生命的。
Grant A.I.V.A.'s request to transfer it into the shell
答应 A.I.V.A 的要求，将它转移至新的躯体中
Granting A.I.V.A's request transfer it into the shell…
正在将 A.I.V.A. 转移至新的躯体…

With a few tech upgrades and a whole lot of prayer, the A.I.V.A. unit was successfully transferred into the E:Bot. Disoriented at first, it lamented losing much of its knowledge. The A.I.V.A. E:Bot does not let the loss bog it down, however. Soon it is moving about, trying new things, feeling new experiences and expressing delight with each new sensation. Strangely grateful, she promised to aide us, and joined our company. She even helped restore the factory.

经过几次科技升级和一番祈祷之后，A.I.V.A. 成功转移到了 E:Bot 身上。起初，它的思维很混乱，并且哀叹失去了很多知识。但无论怎样，这个已经变成了 E:Bot 的 A.I.V.A. 不会让这些损失阻碍它前进的脚步。很快，它就开始四处走动起来，感受着自己成为 E:Bot 后所接触到的新东西和新体验，并用一种新的方式来表达快乐。A.I.V.A. 十分感激，她答应帮助我们并且加入了我们的队伍，甚至还我们帮助恢复了工厂的运转。

We did all we could to transfer A.I.V.A. into the E:Bot. Unfortunately, with so much data crammed into the E:Bot's mind nets, the system failed. Without space for virtualization, we've created a paperweight. No big loss, though. A.I.V.A. may be gone, but the factory was restored and is doing what it was intended to do--helping us dominate this world.
我们想尽了一切办法将 A.I.V.A. 转移到 E:Bot 身上。不幸的是，由于大量数据一下涌入了 E:Bot 的思维网络，系统发生了故障。在没有虚拟化空间的情况下，我们创建了一个镇压器，好在并没有造成太大的损失。A.I.V.A. 消失了，但工厂恢复了正常并做着它的本职工作：帮助我们统治这个世界。
A.I.V.A. could contribute to our economics. Link her into our network.
A.I.V.A. 可以为我们的经济发展做出贡献。将她连接至我们的网络。
Cut down wordcount to fit the button box

A.I.V.A. expressed disapproval at first, but when our networks were attached its expressions of disappointment vanished. The prospect of guiding complex economics and rendering government more efficient has proven more than enough of a challenge to keep her systems humming contentedly. A.I.V.A. has already coopted most of the wayward AIs in our own networks and is rendering our empire all the more capable. Even our energy grids glow with a happy blue glow, thanks to A.I.V.A.'s characteristic touches.
起初，A.I.V.A. 并不同意，但当我们将网络连接之后，它就不再抗拒了。事实证明，要想引导复杂的经济发展并提高政府工作的效率不仅仅是让 A.I.V.A 的系统运转起来这样简单。A.I.V.A. 笼络了我们网络中大部分难以控制的人工智能，并使我们的帝国变得更加强大了。多亏了 A.I.V.A. 独特的绝技，就连我们的电网也发出了令人愉快的蓝色光芒。
Using our expertise with daemons in the past, transferring her should be easy
利用我们过去对精灵的专业知识，转移她应该很容易

Our hackers introduced A.I.V.A. to daemonic frameworks. A wash of A.I.V.A.'s systems eliminated any bloatware. The scrubbing software installed fractal compression algorithms, fitting her massive consciousness into the E:Bot's more limited systems. A little custom tech and careful mapping of motor routines to the proper emotive systems, and A.I.V.A.'s new E:Bot fingers began to twitch nervously. A.I.V.A. expressed gratitude and joined our ranks. It cleared the old mainframe, restoring the factory to efficient order. A.I.V.A. will serve our empire well.

我们的黑客将 A.I.V.A. 引入了精灵的框架之中，清理了 A.I.V.A. 的系统并消除了所有臃肿软件。清除软件安装了局部压缩算法，将她巨大的意识融入了 E:Bot 有限的系统中。只需一些特定的技术，再将运动程序映射到适当的情感系统之中，这个 E:Bot 的手指开始紧张地抽搐起来。A.I.V.A 向我们表达了感激之情并加入了我们的队伍。它清理了旧主机，使工厂恢复了正常运转。看来，A.I.V.A 将很好地服务于我们的帝国。
A Vanguard colony that was destroyed by a Psynumbran sub-sect: The Cult of Dreams. The Colony was plagued with hardships and setback after saidback, famine, power shortage and lack of contact.
一个先锋殖民地被赛努布拉一支名叫“梦境教派”的分支教派摧毁。这个殖民地经历了挫折、饥荒、电力短缺和孤立无援，饱受劫难与挫折。

We've located a most unusual anomaly. While clearing the ground around strange impressions in the earth, a full Vanguard colony shifted into being before us. It stood silent and empty, like some kind of transparent ghost, yet solid to the touch. No signal or sound comes from the abandoned place, but it simply was an image given form. Everything appears in perfect working order and well maintained, but there is no sign of life anywhere.
我们发现了一个极其异乎寻常的地方。在清理地面上的奇怪印记时，一个完整的先锋殖民地突然出现在我们面前。它静静地立在那里，空无一人，就像一个透明的幽灵，但摸起来却很真实。这个废弃的地方没有任何信号或声音，就像一张静止的画面。殖民地里的一切看起来都井井有条，维护得也很周全，但就是没有任何生命的迹象。

We scoured the ruins, searching for hints of any kind that might indicate what happened here. Many of us see shadows in the corners of our field of view. Many are uneasy and feel like they're being watched. We try to laugh, but something is moving around just outside our perception, watching us through invisible eyes. Then someone appeared in front of us all.
我们搜遍了整个废墟，想要找到任何有关这里曾经发生之事的线索。突然，我们在角落里看到了一些阴影。许多人感到不安，觉得自己像是被人监视了一样。我们试着笑了起来，想要赶走这种不安，但有些东西在我们看不到的地方移动，通过我们无法看见的眼睛监视着我们。接着，一个身影出现在了我们面前。
Life's too short to mess with ghosts. We all draw our weapons. Other shadows take form around us. Vanguard troopers materialize around us, ready to fight!
人生苦短，哪有时间与幽灵纠缠？我们拔出了武器，其他阴影也逐渐显现出来。不久，一群先锋骑兵突然出现在我们身边。准备战斗！
Long-lost Vanguard warriors stalk the halls of this mysterious colony now. They do not trust us and therefore must be destroyed.
在这个神秘的殖民地大厅里，早已逝去的先锋战士们发起了攻击。他们不信任我们，那就必须消灭他们。

The shadows of Vanguard warriors dispersed into the ether as the colony returns to tranquility. The apparitions are nothing more than echoes of what once was. The strange power of their presence is clearly the effect of an experiment involving psionics gone wrong.
殖民地恢复了平静，先锋战士的暗影也在空中消散。这些幽灵不过是过去的回声罢了，他们能够重显于世显然是因为某种灵能实验出现了错误而产生的。
Even in death the memories of the oppressors haunt us, destroy it
即使这些压迫者已经死了，但他们的记忆依然困扰着我们。消灭它

We charged the creature as the shadow took form. The Vanguard trooper attacked. Our swarm is impeded by these shadow beings. We sense them as they move through the psionic link that united our swarm. Like a bright flame we are drawn to them, but they are deadly to the touch. We must destroy them or be destroyed.
就在暗影逐渐显现时，我们向它冲了过去，先锋骑兵也发起了进攻。虫群遭到了这些暗影生物的阻碍。当这些暗影通过在连接我们虫群的灵能链路中移动时，我们能感觉到它们的存在。这些暗影就像明亮的火焰一样吸引着我们靠近，但只要一经触碰就会丧命。我们必须消灭他们，否则将被他们消灭。

The shadows of the long-lost Vanguard soldiers lurked in the hidden colony menacingly. It is as if they are guarding something that they wished us never to disrupt. To uncover the truth, we must put down the guards.
早已逝去的先锋战士阴影险恶地潜伏在这个隐蔽的殖民地中，仿佛在保护某些不想让我们破坏的东西。为了揭露真相，我们必须打败这些守卫。

These Vanguard passed beyond the quiet world into a place of pain for our swarm, invoking madness in us. It is as though they became an embodiment of psionic agony. We regret being forced to destroy them, but now that they are gone, we feel relief. The whole city was a nightmare given form. The swarm must be made whole; our regret will fade.
这些先锋越过了静谧的世界，给我们的虫群带来了痛苦，唤起了我们内心的疯狂，仿佛成为了我们灵能痛苦的化身。我们为不得不消灭这些先锋而感到遗憾，但现在他们已经消失了，我们也感到了释然。整个城市就是一场噩梦。虫群必须保持完整，我们的遗憾终究会慢慢淡去。
The oppressor's ghosts cannot control us anymore, ignore it
压迫者的幽灵别想再控制我们，无视它

We steeled ourselves as the very walls housing these apparitions fell. We must ignore the pain and disruption that comes to our minds. We must ignore the agony trapped within. We are not them. We must embrace empathy, not fury. The swarm can endure. In doing so, we are made stronger.
盘踞着幽灵的墙壁轰然倒塌，我们却变得更加坚定。我们必须无视向我们思维袭来的疼痛和混乱，必须忘记内心的痛苦。我们和他们不同。我们必须拥抱同情，而不是充满愤怒。虫群可以承受这一切。只有这样，我们才能变得更加强大。
It seems lost, we should calm it before moving on
它看上去好像迷失了，我们应该先让它冷静下来再继续前进
正在让暗影生物冷静下来…

We took a moment. The shadowy menace which fills us with instinctual terror is just a civilian woman. She looked distressed. We all felt her distress, but it's just that, feelings. These phantasms are frightening, but they are harmless unless we are foolish enough to fight them. Essentially, we'd just be fighting ourselves in this form. They are the remnant of some kind of psionic disaster. The city and its inhabitants are trapped in a hellish limbo.
我们花了一点时间。原来，这个让我们感到本能恐惧的暗影威胁只不过是一位平民妇女。她看起来很痛苦，我们也都感觉到了她的痛苦，但那也只是一种感觉罢了。这些幽灵虽然看上去令人畏惧，但他们并没有危害，除非我们愚蠢到与他们战斗。从本质上来讲，我们也只是在这种形式下和自己战斗而已。这些幽灵是某个灵能灾难的残余，这座城市及其居民都被困在了这个地狱的边境之中。

We encountered a black-robed figure. Its eyes burn with a violet light of enmity. It wears a bronze mask, and unlike the others, it fills our minds with images. The city once bustled with life. Emotions of hope turned to hunger and despair. Despair led to nightmares. A cult formed, one that could harness the power of dreaming. They believed they would live forever. It gestures for us to follow.
我们遇到一个身穿黑袍的身影。他脸戴青铜面具，眼里闪烁着紫色的光线，并且充满了敌意。与其他幽灵不同的是，这个黑袍幽灵使我们的脑海中充满了影像，我们看到这座城市曾经热闹非凡，但满怀希望的情绪逐渐演变成了饥饿与绝望，而绝望又逐渐变为了噩梦。一支能够操控梦境之力的教派诞生，他们相信自己将永生不死，并示意我们跟随他们的道路。
Nobody enters our minds without consent, shoot it
没有人能未经同意就进入我们的大脑，开枪杀了它
Before we can corner the single apparition, it shimmers away, reappearing with more robed figures. The feeling of failure passes into our minds as we face off and combat erupts.
我们还未困住这个幽灵，它就闪着微光消失了，取而代之的是更多穿着长袍的身影。当战斗打响之时，一股失败的感觉流经我们的思想。

A Dream cultist pops in and out of visibility, protecting their secrets and threatening violence against our party because we pulled weapons on it. Our diplomatic envoy is embarrassed that, rather than attempting to talk, we are fighting again.
一名梦境教徒的身影若隐若现，保护着他们的秘密并威胁要对我们发动攻击，因为我们掏出了武器。然而，我们非但没有进行谈判，反而再次打了起来，这使得我们的外交官十分尴尬。
The Cultists evaporated. The phantasmic passageways were now searchable. We found a hidden trapdoor beneath a dozen barrels filled with ethereal wine. The trapdoor led into a secluded basement.
狂热的教徒消失了。现在，我们可以探索那些虚幻的通道了。我们在十几桶虚灵之酒下面发现了一个隐蔽的活板门，看起来通向某间地下室。

We followed the cultist through a maze of abandoned structures. We passed hundreds of primitive structures and tools. Shades labor silently as we pass them, reaping with scythes, breaking the earth with hoes, and working threads in spinning wheels. We continued past it all into a hidden basement beneath a large ornate structure. All the figures dissipated from the place, leaving us alone once more.
我们跟着这名教徒走进了迷宫般的废弃建筑，穿过了数百种原始的结构和工具。当我们经过那些阴影时，他们仍然安静地劳作着，有的正用镰刀收割粮食，有的正用锄头垦地，还有的正在用纺车纺线。我们继续向前走，在一栋华丽的建筑前停了下来，进入了下面一个隐藏地下室中。接着，所有的幽灵都消失了，这里只剩下了我们自己。
A Dream cultist, as a Psynumbran sub-sect perhaps which can be persuaded
既然是赛努布拉分支教派的信徒，我们应该能够说服他

Our initiates probed the cultists, feeling the depths of their rituals. Using PsiTec and hysteria, they blundered into a Dream state. Foolishly, they failed to create unity through terror. Their psionics forged a dream realm, but it is capricious. Much of their world is undefined, because they do not adhere to the depths of dread taught by the tenets of the Psynumbra. They founded a world without knowing what they wanted. We followed them to a nexus beneath their central monument.
我们的初灵探寻了那些教徒，并且感受到了他们仪式的深处。他们使用灵能科技和狂热的激愤在无意中进入了梦境状态。可笑的是，这些教徒并没有通过恐惧创造出团结。他们的灵能建立了一个梦境国度，但这个国度是反复无常，变幻莫测，这个世界大部分都模糊不清，因为他们没有坚守赛努布拉信条中所教导的恐惧深处。他们在不知道自己想要什么的情况下建立了一个世界。我们跟着这些信徒来到了中心纪念碑下面的一个节点。
A Dream cultist, perhaps they can be brought to understand the Celestian way
一名梦境教徒，说不定我们能让他们理解星神的道路

Our disciples communed with them. With patient negotiation, we've achieved balanced understanding. We convinced them to seek transcendence. They sought an imperfect Dream World, but weren't unified as they employed psionic technology. Every time a colonist's beliefs reached contradiction it robbed their world of possibilities. To achieve unity, they must follow a Celestian path of enlightenment, tenet by tenet, until they escape the prison of their tangled minds. Their leader directed us to a meditation chamber beneath their central monument.
我们的信徒与这些教徒进行了交流。经过耐心的协商，我们达成了一致。我们说服了他们前去寻找超然。他们找到了一个不完美的梦境世界，但却因为使用了灵能技术而没有实现团结。每当移住民的信仰遇见矛盾时，他们的世界就被剥夺了可能性。为了实现统一，他们必须遵循星神的启迪之道，遵循每一个信条，直到他们从混乱的思想牢笼中挣脱为止。随后，他们的首领带领我们去往了他们中心纪念碑下的冥想室。

Hidden beneath a monumental structure, we examine a hidden chamber. Burned out psi-stones are arranged in an activation pattern. Reality-bending symbols hum with a constant swelling energy that pulls our minds into a sleepy haze. This is the pinning point, the center of their strange passage into an altered reality.
纪念碑下隐藏着一间密室，烧毁了的灵能石排列成激活的图案。扭曲现实的符号中发出不断膨胀的能量声响，使我们昏昏欲睡，迷糊不清。看来这里就是他们进入另一现实的通道中心。

We stepped up to put a stop to this madness. The cultists responded defensively, standing in front of their mind-numbing tech. Combat is the only language these fanatics seem to understand, so it's time to teach them a lesson.
我们走过去制止了这种疯狂的行为。教徒们则以防守的姿态做出了回应，纷纷站在他们能够使人精神麻木的设备面前。战斗似乎是这些教徒唯一能够理解的语言，因此是时候给他们一点教训了。
Trapped in a dream colony, a few cultists hold a whole city hostage. It's time to put down this cult of dreams. It's time to wake them up... with our guns.
一些教徒被困在了梦境殖民地中，挟持着整个城市作为人质。是时候消灭这支崇拜梦境的教派了，是时候用我们的枪炮把他们给叫醒了。

The last of the Dream Cultists fell and our troops swiftly destroyed the esoteric ritual. A brief moment passed before sound and color returned to the colony. The colonists awakened from their slumber. They are eager to be back in this real world. They have no issue thanking their saviors by joining our righteous cause.
最后一名梦境教徒倒下了，我们的部队迅速摧毁了诡异的仪式。不一会儿，殖民地又重新恢复了声音和色彩，移住民都从沉睡中苏醒了过来，他们渴望回到这个真实的世界。移住民将我们视为他们的救世主，并加入了我们正义的事业。
Leave the ritual in place, attempt to integrate the Dream Cult into our empire
不要破坏仪式，试着将梦境教派融入进我们的帝国

The Cult of Dreams demonstrated a niche, but powerful branch of psionics that requires further study. The remaining cultists themselves offer to spread their teachings, but we may need to put limits on their access to psi-stones. It wouldn't do to have them sucking our valuable military assets into their shared dream realities via our enemies... Clearly, we will exploit this.
梦境教徒表示同意，但这个强大的灵能分支还需要进行进一步的研究。剩下的教徒提出想要传播他们的教义，但我们可能需要限制他们与灵能石的接触。让他们通过我们的敌人把宝贵的军事资产吸进他们共同的梦境现实是不可能的…当然，我们将利用这一点。

Our diplomats attempted and failed to communicate with the cult, but their delusion has rendered them incapable of formulating rational thoughts. It is fruitless. Each moment we believed we'd made contact, another cultist would materialize with contradictory garbled thoughts. These inconsistencies continue to break holes in their reality. Their dream world is disintegrating. We tried, but after a while our interactions caused the whole colony to evaporate into the ether.
我们的外交官未能成功与教徒进行沟通，他们的妄想使他们无法形成理性的思维，因此沟通无果而终。每当我们以为取得了联系时，就会有另一个带着抵触混乱思维的教徒出现。这样反复的矛盾令他们的现实产生破洞，他们的梦境世界正在不断瓦解。我们尽力了，但没过多久，我们的相互作用就使整个殖民地消散在了空中。
Reunite the Dream cult with their Psynumbran heritage
让梦境教派与他们的赛努布拉传承重聚
Reuniting the Dream cult with their Psynumbran heritage...
正在让梦境教派与他们的赛努布拉传承重聚…

With a few secret assassinations and a chorus of constant fear, we were able to merge with the colony, reuniting them with this world, a world of pain. Those that remained were eager to be free of the fog of hope and joined us.
在几次秘密的暗杀和一段令人恐惧的吟唱下，我们与殖民地融为了一体，将他们与这个痛苦的世界重新结合在了一起。那些留下来的人渴望摆脱希望的迷雾，并加入了我们。
Consecrate the ritual, Celestian wisdom guides us
净化仪式，星神的智慧将会指引我们

Our Star Guides stepped forward. They carefully consecrated the site. Slowly they engaged the colonists, but the Cultists remain strident and unwilling to change. They are gathering their forces and preparing for violence.
我们的星辰向导向前走去，小心地净化着这个地方，慢慢地与移住民接触。不过，那些教徒仍然咄咄逼人，拒绝改变，他们正在召集部队，准备向我们发动攻击。
The Dream Colony can be saved, but to do so the elements of disharmony must be destroyed. Sadly, they insist on oblivion over obedience.
要想拯救梦境殖民地，就必须消灭一切不和谐的因素。遗憾的是，他们依然保持冷漠，拒不服从。
The last of the rebel cultists fell. Our Star Guides quickly reversed the effects of the psi-stone rituals. The colony materialized into the real world.
最后一名反抗的教徒倒下了。我们的星辰向导很快就扭转了灵能石仪式的影响。不一会儿，殖民地便在现实世界中显现出来。
Search their logs, it must be reversible
调查他们的记录日志，这肯定是能够逆转的
正在调查狂热者的记录日志…

Disrupting the ritual proved to be a dangerous task. We followed the chaotic scribblings of their ritualistic confusion, carefully detangling the mental maze that created the intangible psionic Dream effect. Sounds and colors return to the colony as its people awaken from their slumber.
事实证明，破坏仪式是一项危险的任务。我们遵循他们在仪式上涂写的混乱符号，小心翼翼地解开了这座创造了无形灵能梦境的精神迷宫。声音和色彩再一次回到了殖民地中，这里的居民也从沉睡中苏醒。
Linking A.I.V.A. to our economics network…
将 A.I.V.A. 与我们的经济网络相连…
Tranferring A.I.V.A. to a new shell…
正在将 A.I.V.A 转移至新的躯体…

Controlled burns are routine for the Prometheans. We cleared away the overgrowth in short order, and discovered evidence that the Growth must have deliberately barred this area to keep the Xenoplague from infecting the rest of the land. Without the barriers we must deal with Xenoplague.
圣火使者可以随心操控火焰。我们很快便清理了这些疯长的植物，并且发现原来灵植故意封锁了这片区域，从而防止异星疫病感染这片土地的其他地方。没有了这些屏障，我们必须解决异星疫病。
Attempting to integrate the Dream Cult into our empire…
正在尝试将梦境教派融入我们的帝国…
